mdRecord.dcterms:title: William M. Dickerson Family
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1284_Wm M. Dickerson Family ID; Front row: Patriarch William M. Dickerson, 2nd wife Ellen (Hylton), Mullen (son) and baby, Nija (son in law) and son Harman Dickerson, Haskew Dickerson (Loula and Nija's son). Rear: Hiley Moses and wife Josie (daughter), Eliza Hylton (daughter), Rosalie
